scheme_name: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Jan Arogya Yojana
description: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Jan Arogya Yojana provides cashless health insurance for low-income families, covering critical illnesses and hospitalization.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 1.5 lakh per family per year
Covers 971 procedures, including surgeries and therapies

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 1.5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families with yellow, orange, or white ration cards

steps: Register at empanelled hospital or through scheme website
Receive health card for cashless treatment
